text: The Commissioner, within 120 days of April 9, 1997, shall issue rules and regulations necessary to implement the provisions of this chapter. To facilitate the timely issuance of rules and regulations, the Commissioner may contract out for the drafting of rules and regulations pursuant to emergency procurement provisions set forth in § 2-354.05.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 35-4522.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 19-171 substituted "set forth in § 2-354.05" for "set forth in § 2- 303.12".

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-235, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3401.

For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 34-808.02.

DC CODE § 31-3422

Current through December 11, 2012
